name: Open Hours
description: workers may communicate with each other more easily and find a convenient divide between work life and home life

name: appoinment
description: to make an appointment: to arrange, to organize a meeting, a date. idiom. I made an appointment for next Friday, but I now need to re-arrange it.

name: online billing system
description: Online bill payment is a secure electronic service that allows customers to pay bills without having to write checks and mail them.
